definition: to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil
to cry (of birds, animals and insects)/to make a sound/to voice (one's gratitude, grievance etc)

sentences.english: A door cracks open, and a blast of electric guitar erupts into the corridor.
sentences.chinese: 門開着一道縫，電吉他的爆鳴透過門縫傳到走廊上。

sentences.english: This paper explores the demonstrating experiment on hydrogen and oxygen's burst.
sentences.chinese: 針對氫氣和氧氣的爆鳴實驗進行改進與探索。
